event.title: Lecture about Free Software and Information Ethics, Humboldt University, Berlin

body.p: On Wednesday, January 21 2015, Erik Albers will give a lecture about Free Software and information ethics at the Berlin School of Library and Information Science at the Humboldt University in Dorotheenstra√üe 26, 10117 Berlin, Room 120. Start is at 12 am, language is English.
